name: query
description: Query the KGraph system with a specific query string.

arguments.name: prompt
arguments.desc: The query string to search for.

name: ingestion
description: Ingest a path of file into the KGraph system.

arguments.name: path
arguments.desc: The file path to ingest into the KGraph system.

name: extract
description: Extract graph data from a document using the KGraph system.

arguments.name: text
arguments.desc: The nodes, entities and relations to extract information from.
